custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Comfy Controller
custom_nodes.description: A simple controller panel that gathers all widgets from red nodes

custom_nodes.author: YarvixPA
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NeuralMedia
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes modified to achieve things I felt were missing.

custom_nodes.author: SpenserCai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FunAudioLLM
custom_nodes.description: Comfyui custom node for [a/FunAudioLLM](https://funaudiollm.github.io/) include [a/CosyVoice](https://github.com/FunAudioLLM/CosyVoice) and [a/SenseVoice](https://github.com/FunAudioLLM/SenseVoice).

custom_nodes.author: akatz-ai
custom_nodes.title: ðŸŒŠ Depthflow Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of DepthFlow nodes for ComfyUI, adds a 2.5D parallax effect to images and videos. Compatible with Ryan's Flex system.

custom_nodes.author: spacepxl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Depth-Pro
custom_nodes.description: Based on [a/https://github.com/apple/ml-depth-pro](https://github.com/apple/ml-depth-pro)

custom_nodes.author: yuvraj108c
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Rife TensorRT
custom_nodes.description: This project provides a TensorRT implementation of [a/RIFE](https://github.com/hzwer/ECCV2022-RIFE) for ultra fast frame interpolation inside ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: rdancer
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Florence2SAM2
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node implementing Florence 2 + Segment Anything Model 2, based on [a/SkalskiP's HuggingFace space](https://huggingface.co/spaces/SkalskiP/florence-sam)

custom_nodes.author: raysers
custom_nodes.title: Mflux-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
Simple use of [a/Mflux](https://github.com/filipstrand/mflux) in ComfyUI, suitable for users who are not familiar with terminal usage.
NOTE: A MLX port of FLUX based on the Huggingface Diffusers implementation.

custom_nodes.author: educator-art
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Load-DirectoryFiles
custom_nodes.description: This node loads prompts (txt) and images (png) from a specified directory. By specifying an index, it outputs the selected file.

custom_nodes.author: GadzoinksOfficial
custom_nodes.title: Gadzoinks
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for integrating with gadzoinks iPhone app

custom_nodes.author: civen-cn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PaddleOcr
custom_nodes.description: Nodes related to [a/PaddleOCR](https://paddlepaddle.github.io/PaddleOCR) OCR.

custom_nodes.author: daxcay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-YouTubeVideoPlayer
custom_nodes.description: Plays youtube video in comfy.

custom_nodes.author: da2el-ai
custom_nodes.title: D2-nodes-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a collection of custom nodes that make ComfyUI slightly more convenient.[w/This node pack integrates ComfyUI-d2-size-selector, ComfyUI-d2-steps, and ComfyUI-d2-xyplot-utils. To avoid conflicts, please delete the existing node packs if you install this one.]

custom_nodes.author: willchil
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Environment-Visualizer
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI node pack allows the user to take a panoramic image and a corresponding depth map, and turn them into a 3D environment, which they can view in an immersive WebXR environment.

custom_nodes.author: APZmedia
custom_nodes.title: APZmedia Fast Image Save Node
custom_nodes.description: This node for ComfyUI allows saving images with an optional alpha channel (transparency). It supports saving images in formats like PNG, JPEG, and WebP.

custom_nodes.author: nilor-corp
custom_nodes.title: Nilor Nodes by Nilor Corp
custom_nodes.description: Custom utility nodes for ComfyUI by Nilor Corp. Probably not useful for most people, but contains stuff for working with lists, filenames, image batches, etc in a very specifc way.

custom_nodes.author: okg21
custom_nodes.title: VLLMVisionChatNode
custom_nodes.description: This platform extension provides ZhipuAI nodes, enabling you to configure a workflow for online video generation.

custom_nodes.author: L.HC
custom_nodes.title: SimpleToolsNodes
custom_nodes.description: Two simple nodes: 1. Get the steps based on the model name, 2. Generate prompts using chatglm.

custom_nodes.author: BRIA AI
custom_nodes.title: BRIA AI API nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI using BRIA's API.

custom_nodes.author: danbochman
custom_nodes.title: FASHN Virtual Try-On
custom_nodes.description: Node for the FASHN Virtual Try-On API. Requires an API Key from fashn.ai

custom_nodes.author: ez-af
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EZ-AF-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This pack helps to conveniently control text in complex prompt-builder type workflows. Load/Read Prompts from .CSV; Concatenate large amounts of text; Use string input as ANY type. Requires pythongosssss custom scripts

custom_nodes.author: Darth-Veitcher
custom_nodes.title: Comfy DV
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: String Formatting (f-string and jinja2), Random Choice, Model Memory management, and other quality of life improvements.

custom_nodes.author: kijai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI wrapper nodes for LVCD
custom_nodes.description: Original repo: [a/https://github.com/luckyhzt/LVCD](https://github.com/luckyhzt/LVCD)

custom_nodes.author: guyaton
custom_nodes.title: guy-nodes-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: These are designed to be custom nodes i found usefulness to that hopefully others can share.

custom_nodes.author: fssorc
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FFT
custom_nodes.description: Perform a Fast Fourier Transform on the image, and then users can freely select the filtering range to filter the image. The main function is to remove the grid patterns on the image, and it can also perform high-pass filtering and low-pass filtering. The detailed workflow is shown in the figure below. The PNG file contains the ComfyUI workflow.The working principle is similar to the FFT filter in Photoshop.

custom_nodes.author: StartHua
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_CXH_FluxLoraMerge
custom_nodes.description:
flux lora merge.
adaptive Merge (uses tensor norms and weight), manual Merge (uses fixed weights you specify), additive Merge (uses 100% of the first and adds a percentage of the second)

custom_nodes.author: creeper
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_nai_api
custom_nodes.description: A node that can use Nai in Comfyui

custom_nodes.author: acorderob
custom_nodes.title: Prompt PostProcessor
custom_nodes.description: The Prompt PostProcessor (PPP), formerly known as 'sd-webui-sendtonegative', is an extension designed to process the prompt, possibly after other extensions have modified it.

custom_nodes.author: Moooonet
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ArteMoon
custom_nodes.description: This plugin works with [a/IF_AI_Tools](https://github.com/if-ai/ComfyUI-IF_AI_tools) to build a workflow in ComfyUI that uses AI to assist in generating prompts.

custom_nodes.author: thoddnn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI MLX Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Faster workflows for ComfyUI users on Mac with Apple silicon

custom_nodes.author: syaofox
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_fnodes
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI_fnodes is a collection of custom nodes designed for ComfyUI. These nodes provide additional functionality that can enhance your ComfyUI workflows.
File manipulation tools, Image resizing tools, IPAdapter tools, Image processing tools, Mask tools, Face analysis tools, Sampler tools, Miscellaneous tools

custom_nodes.author: CY-CHENYUE
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Molmo
custom_nodes.description: Use of the molmo model.Generate detailed image descriptions and analysis using Molmo models in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: IDGallagher
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IG-Motion-I2V
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI adaptation of https://github.com/G-U-N/Motion-I2V

custom_nodes.author: codecringebinge
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Arrow-Key-Canvas-Navigation
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI Custom Node that enables arrow key canvas navigation with a pan speed setting.

custom_nodes.author: CY-CHENYUE
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MiniCPM-Plus
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for MiniCPM language models in ComfyUI. Provides advanced text generation and image understanding functions.

custom_nodes.author: ycyy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-YCYY-LoraInfo
custom_nodes.description: You can use this node to get information about lora. For example trigger words, description and example images.

custom_nodes.author: asaddi
custom_nodes.title: Yet Another LLM Node (for ComfyUI)
custom_nodes.description: Yet another set of LLM nodes for ComfyUI. This one only supports OpenAI-like APIs, but of course can be used with local LLM providers such as [a/llama.cpp](https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp) (and, I believe, ollama and LMStudio, among others).

custom_nodes.author: CRT
custom_nodes.title: CRT-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This set includes toggle nodes for Lora Unet blocks L1/L2 and a node to remove trailing comma from string end.

custom_nodes.author: valofey
custom_nodes.title: OpenRouter Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a node to use OpenRouter API from within ComfyUI. It supports both prompt and image+prompt requests (for multimodal LLMs).

custom_nodes.author: GiusTex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DiffusersImageOutpaint
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for outpainting images with diffusers, based on [a/diffusers-image-outpaint](https://huggingface.co/spaces/fffiloni/diffusers-image-outpaint/tree/main) by fffiloni.

custom_nodes.author: Charlweed
custom_nodes.title: ImageTransceiver - ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ImageTransceiver is a custom node that enables image generating clients to connect directly to ComfyUI, and send those images in near real-time. For example, an image manipulation program like GIMP can connect an image to a workflow in ComfyUI, and every time the image changes in GIMP, the changes are immediately made in the workflow. Cloning

custom_nodes.author: tanglaoya321
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-StoryMaker
custom_nodes.description:
NODES:StoryMakerSinglePortraitNode, StoryMakerTwoPortraitNode, StoryMakerSwapClothNode.
StoryMaker's simple ComfyUI wrapper

custom_nodes.author: PabloGFX
custom_nodes.title: Google Photos Loader - by PabloGFX
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that integrates Google Photos into your workflows. List albums, load images from specific albums, and search photos directly within ComfyUI. Features customizable image loading options, sorting, and efficient caching for seamless integration of your Google Photos library into AI image processing pipelines.

custom_nodes.author: Nojahhh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI GLM-4 Wrapper
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI GLM-4 Wrapper. This powerful tool enhances your prompt engineering process by allowing users to easily construct detailed, high-quality prompts for image/video generation based on user image and/or user prompts.

custom_nodes.author: SeanScripts
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PixtralLlamaMolmoVision
custom_nodes.description:
For loading and running Pixtral, Llama 3.2 Vision, and Molmo models. Put models in the models/LLM folder.
[w/Renamed from ComfyUI-PixtralLlamaVision. Please reinstall.]

custom_nodes.author: DareFail
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Roboflow
custom_nodes.description:
This is a ComfyUI node that connects with [a/Roboflow workflows](https://roboflow.com/workflows/build).
Roboflow hosts hundreds of thousands of open source and custom object detection models.

custom_nodes.author: turkyden
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SmartCrop
custom_nodes.description: a ComfyUI Custom Node for [a/smartcrop.py](https://github.com/smartcrop/smartcrop.py)

custom_nodes.author: silveroxides
custom_nodes.title: Model and Checkpoint Loaders for NF4 and FP4
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes for loading both Checkpoints and UNET/Diffussion models quantized to bitsandbytes NF4 or FP4 format.
Still under development and some limitations such as using LoRA might apply still.

custom_nodes.author: logtd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ViewCrafter
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes to use [a/ViewCrafter](https://github.com/Drexubery/ViewCrafter/tree/main) for novel view synthesis.

custom_nodes.author: dfghsdh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FluxPromptGen
custom_nodes.description:
Flux Prompt Generator is a custom node set for ComfyUI that enhances prompt generation and image captioning capabilities. It integrates advanced language models and image captioning techniques to provide versatile and powerful prompt manipulation tools for your AI image generation workflows.
NOTE:PORT OF [a/https://huggingface.co/Aitrepreneur/FLUX-Prompt-Generator](https://huggingface.co/Aitrepreneur/FLUX-Prompt-Generator) for COMFYUI

custom_nodes.author: liushuchun
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Lora_List_With_Url_Loader
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:ComfyUI_Lora_List_With_Url_Loader. Load  loras from  urls and auto fetch them on web if they are missing.

custom_nodes.author: leeguandong
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CompareModelWeights
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes to use CompareModelWeights

custom_nodes.author: discus0434
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Flux Accelerator
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Flux Accelerator is a custom node for ComfyUI that accelerates Flux.1 image generation, just by using this node.

custom_nodes.author: edelvarden
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageMetadataExtension
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for ComfyUI. It adds additional metadata for saved images, ensuring compatibility with the Civitai website.

custom_nodes.author: yuvraj108c
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Facerestore TensorRT
custom_nodes.description:
This project provides an experimental Tensorrt implementation for ultra fast face restoration inside ComfyUI.
Note: This project doesn't do pre/post processing. It only works on cropped faces for now.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_pixtral_vision
custom_nodes.description: The ComfyUI_pixtral_vision is a powerful ComfyUI node designed to integrate seamlessly with the Mistral Pixtral API. It facilitates the analysis of images through deep learning models, interpreting and describing the visual content. Users can input an image directly and provide prompts for context, utilizing an API key for authentication.

custom_nodes.author: banqingyuan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-text-replace
custom_nodes.description: NODES: OCR Location Node, Image Erase Node, Chat Overlay Node, Extract JSON Node.

custom_nodes.author: blob8
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_sloppy-comic
custom_nodes.description: Using IPAdapter for style consistency, the node accepts a story structured as text {prompt} text {prompt} etc. and generates a comic, saving it to /output. It also adds LLM API Request node, providing an openai compatible LLM API for generating the stories.

custom_nodes.author: mingsky
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MingNodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: ConvertGrayChannelNode, AdjustBrightnessContrastSaturationNode, BaiduTranslateNode.

custom_nodes.author: StartHua
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_CXH_DeepLX
custom_nodes.description: NODES: CXH_DeepLX_Free, CXH_DeepLX_translate

custom_nodes.author: pedrogengo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LumaAI-API
custom_nodes.description: Luma Dream Machine API official ComfyUI custom node.

custom_nodes.author: cubiq
custom_nodes.title: Flux blocks patcher sampler
custom_nodes.description: This is an (very) advanced and (very) experimental custom node for the ComfyUI. It allows you to iteratively change the blocks weights of Flux models and check the difference each value makes.

custom_nodes.author: da2el-ai
custom_nodes.title: D2 XYPlot Utils
custom_nodes.description:
Custom node for using Prompt S/R in XY Plot
Also includes nodes for listing generic parameters like seed and cfg
Easy to manipulate as elements are separated by line breaks
Designed for use with the XY Plot custom node qq-nodes-comfyui, but may work with other custom nodes as well

custom_nodes.author: 311-code
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI MagicClip_Strength for SDXL
custom_nodes.description: This project allows you to adjust SDXL's two text encoder's strengths individually for clip_g (ViT-bigG) and clip_l (CLIP-ViT-L) within ComfyUI. (And other adjustments)

custom_nodes.author: godmt
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-List-Utils
custom_nodes.description: LIST and BATCH utilities which support: create, convert, get or slice items

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: ViewCrafter-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a custom node for [a/ViewCrafter](https://github.com/Drexubery/ViewCrafter)

custom_nodes.author: Isi-dev
custom_nodes.title: Image to Painting and Inspyrenet Assistant Nodes
custom_nodes.description: These are ComfyUI nodes to assist in converting images to paintings and to assist the Inspyrenet Rembg node to totally remove, or replace with a color, the original background from images so that the background does not reappear in videos or in nodes that do not retain the alpha channel in rgba images.
